articles.description: The batter looks like he is ready to face world class fast bowlers and does not look as aggressive as he bats when he is out in the middle.
articles.content: India finally clicked as a team in the third T20I against South Africa with their batters and bowlers working in tandem to keep them in the series. While they could not defend a record target in the … [+2699 chars]

articles.title: Former Pakistan captain Shahid Afridi questions Virat Kohli's attitude: Does he really want to be No.1 again? - India Today
articles.description: Virat Kohli, whose centuries have dried up, was rested for the five T20Is against South Africa after the conclusion of the 2022 Indian Premier League. He has not registered an international century for over two years.
articles.content:
Former Pakistan captain Shahid Afridi has questioned Virat Kohli's attitude as the ex-India skipper continues to go through a lean patch.

articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: PCB to discuss IPL's 'two-and-a-half month window' with other cricket boards: Report - Times Now
articles.description: The Pakistan Cricket Board isn't entirely happy with the BCCI's plan to have a two-and-a half-month window for IPL from the next season onwards. PCB is reportedly planning to discuss the same with other boards at the next ICC board meeting.
